data.message:
Hi, I have a problem with facebook business page I manage https://www.facebook.com/YasonOptika/ . Over night it was suddenly unpublished. We sent an appeal but the answer was that the page name changed or we merged page with some other page and that is why facebook unpublished it - but this was NOT the case. We did no merging and the page name is the same.
Can you please help?

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Marković. Please report it to us by following these steps: http://bit.ly/2efxyq3. -Joe
Facebook Business thanks for answering, when can I expect this issue to be resolved?
